pages.text: The Arboreal Extractor is a device that extracts fluid from an adjacent tree. Can optionally take fertilizer to boost production rate. Bonemeal boosts output by 1.5x for 8 cycles, while $(l:thermal:world/plants/phytogro)phyto-gro$(/l) boosts by 2.0x for 16 cycles. Different trees produce different fluids. Oak, birch, spruce, and acacia trees make resin. Jungle trees yield latex. Dark oak trees contain sap.
